channel.title: Error 718 client
channel.description:
hello,
me and some friends want to code and play a bit on a 718/753 server. i didn't code for a long time so don't judge me for stupid mistakes, thanks. the problem is that i can connect to the server and play on it perfectly fine, but my friends get errors, so i dont know what the problem is. I'm using rune evo (v2) source, the rune evo (v3) cache (so thats 718/753 i guess) and a foxtrot 718 client.
this is the error we got:
[code]C:\Users\eigenaar\Guardian718\guardian\live Error: Class291.method2752:182 Class291.method2751:92 client.init:519 Loader.sta rtClient:117 Loader.doFrame:52 Loader.main:36 Class52_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 java.net.UR LClassLoader$1.run java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run java.security.AccessController. doPrivileged java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass s un.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass more | java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Class52_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Sour ce) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at java.net.URL.openStream(Unknown Source) at IPAddress.method6062(IPAddress.java:127) at Class291.method2751(Class291.java:94) at client.init(client.java:519) at Loader.startClient(Loader.java:117) at Loader.doFrame(Loader.java:52) at Loader.main(Loader.java:36) error_game_crash [/code]
maybe it's an easy error to fix, i don't know, so please help me out, thanks.

item.title: Error 718 client
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I don’t think the classes are being found using the URLClassLoader (could be caused by a couple of other issues too). Try not to use functions you don’t understand. One idea that comes to mind is how the directory separate may differ between your computers, in the class loader when loading your class use System.getProperty(“path.separator”) instead of slashes to separate folders.

Read full topic

item.title: Error 718 client
item.dc:creator: @Monkey-G Monkey-G
item.description:
@Monkey-G wrote:

hello,

me and some friends want to code and play a bit on a 718/753 server.
i didn’t code for a long time so don’t judge me for stupid mistakes, thanks. the problem is that i can connect to the server and play on it perfectly fine, but my friends get errors, so i dont know what the problem is. I’m using rune evo (v2) source, the rune evo (v3) cache (so thats 718/753 i guess) and a foxtrot 718 client.

this is the error we got:

C:\Users\eigenaar\Guardian718\guardian\live Error: Class291.method2752:182 Class291.method2751:92 client.init:519 Loader.sta rtClient:117 Loader.doFrame:52 Loader.main:36 Class52_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 java.net.UR LClassLoader$1.run java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run java.security.AccessController. doPrivileged java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass s un.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass more | java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Class52_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1 java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Sour ce) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at java.net.URL.openStream(Unknown Source) at IPAddress.method6062(IPAddress.java:127) at Class291.method2751(Class291.java:94) at client.init(client.java:519) at Loader.startClient(Loader.java:117) at Loader.doFrame(Loader.java:52) at Loader.main(Loader.java:36) error_game_crash
